Package com.company.Database.Users

Class UsersData

java.lang.Object
com.company.Database.Users.UsersData
public class UsersData
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UsersData​(UsersDataSource dataSource)
    Constructor initializes the list model that holds userID as Integers and attempts to read any data saved from previous invocations of the application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    Adds a User to the database.

    Checks the availability of a username.

    Retrieves Users details from the model.

    Accessor for the list model.
    java.lang.Boolean login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hashedPassword)  
    void persist()
    Saves the data in the database using a persistence mechanism.
    void remove​(java.lang.Object key)
    Based on the username of the User in the database, delete the User.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(User user)
      Adds a User to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - User to add to the database.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword​(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.Integer userID)
      Changes the user's password
      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password that the user wants
      userID - the ID of the user that wants to change their password

    • remove

      public void remove​(java.lang.Object key)
      Based on the username of the User in the database, delete the User.
      Parameters:
      key - userID

    • persist

      public void persist()
      Saves the data in the database using a persistence mechanism.

    • get

      public User get​(java.lang.Object key)
      Retrieves Users details from the model.
      Parameters:
      key - the username to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the User object related to the username.

    • checkUsernameAvailability

      public java.lang.Boolean checkUsernameAvailability​(java.lang.String username)
      Checks the availability of a username.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the boolean of username availability.
